briefdescription.para: Check the suspend and resume functionality in a cooperative thread.

detaileddescription.para: Create a thread with the priority lower than the current thread which is cooperative and suspend it, make sure it doesn't gets scheduled, and resume and check if the entry function is executed.

briefdescription.para: Check the suspend and resume functionality in preemptive thread.

detaileddescription.para: Create a thread with the priority lower than the current thread which is preemptive and suspend it, make sure it doesn't gets scheduled, and resume and check if the entry function is executed.

briefdescription.para: Check that k_thread_suspend() is a schedule point when called on the current thread.
Check that k_thread_suspend() cancels a preexisting thread timeout.

detaileddescription.para: Suspended threads should not wake up unexpectedly if they happened to have been sleeping when suspended.
Use k_thread_state_str() to get thread state. Resume an unsuspend thread will not change the thread state.
